entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 11:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.8°C
Wind: E 25 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this evening. Snow at times heavy inland. Local blowing snow early this evening. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Snowfall amount 25 cm inland. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
